intro: Rabdosia yuennanensis, commonly known as the Yunnan rabdosia, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Lamiaceae family, which includes many aromatic herbs and shrubs. The plant is characterized by its square stems and opposite leaves, typical of the mint family. It produces small, clustered flowers that are usually pink or purple in color. Rabdosia yuennanensis is often found in moist, shaded environments in mountainous regions.
